34 from __future__ import print_function
35 
36 PKG = 'ros_example_pkg'
37 NAME = 'oracle_test'
38 
39 import sys
40 import unittest
41 
42 # import rospy
43 import rostest
44 # import rosunit
45 import numpy as np
46 from ros_python_lib_example.oracle import Oracle
47 
48 
49 class TestOracle(unittest.TestCase):
50 
51  def testOracleGoodInput(self):
52  o = Oracle(seed=42)
53  prediction = o.getPrediction(min=3, max=7)
54  self.assertGreaterEqual(prediction, 3, "Prediction is out of range.")
55  self.assertLessEqual(prediction, 7, "Prediction is out of range.")
56 
57  def testOracleMixedInput(self):
58  o = Oracle(seed=42)
59  prediction = o.getPrediction(min=3.05, max=7)
60  self.assertGreaterEqual(prediction, 3.05, "Prediction is out of range.")
61  self.assertLessEqual(prediction, 7, "Prediction is out of range.")
62 
63  prediction = o.getPrediction(min=10.05, max=7)
64  self.assertGreaterEqual(prediction, min(10.05, 7), "Prediction is out of range.")
65  self.assertLessEqual(prediction, max(10.05, 7), "Prediction is out of range.")
66 
67  def testOracleSeeding(self):
68  o = Oracle(seed=42)
69  o2 = Oracle(seed=42)
70  prediction = [o.getPrediction(min=3.05, max=7) for _ in range(100)]
71  prediction2 = [o2.getPrediction(min=3.05, max=7) for _ in range(100)]
72 
73  self.assertTrue(np.allclose(np.array(prediction), np.array(prediction2)), "Both prediction series should be eual")
74 
75 if __name__ == '__main__':
76  rostest.rosrun(PKG, NAME, TestOracle, sys.argv)
77  # rosunit.unitrun(PKG, 'test_oracle', TestOracle)
